sentences.en: All cheques should be made out to "EF International Language Schools"
sentences.cn: 所有支票的收款人都应是“英孚国际语言学校”。

sentences.en: He is the finest stylist in the English language of today.
sentences.cn: 他是当今英语世界中文采最好的。

sentences.en: Her son used sign language to tell her what happened.
sentences.cn: 她儿子用手语告诉她发生了什么事。

sentences.en: His misunderstanding of language was the primary cause of his other problems.
sentences.cn: 他对语言的误解是引起其他问题的主要原因。

sentences.en: How many languages do you speak?
I realized I had to surmount the language barrier.
sentences.cn: 我意识到我不得不克服语言障碍。

sentences.en: Language is something which fundamentally distinguishes humans from animals.
sentences.cn: 语言是将人类与动物区分开来的基本特征。

sentences.en: one of the best-known poems in the English language
sentences.cn: 最著名的英语诗歌之一

sentences.en: Sonia might not speak the English language well, but then who did?
sentences.cn: 索尼娅的英语也许说得不好，但谁又说得好呢？

sentences.en: Television companies tend to censor bad language in feature films.
sentences.cn: 电视公司往往会在审查故事片时删去其中的粗话。

sentences.en: The child'll start out by making relatively few distinctions in the language.
sentences.cn: 孩子开始时不太能辨别语言中的差别。

sentences.en: The language of Darwin was intelligible to experts and non-experts alike.
sentences.cn: 达尔文的语言无论对专家还是非专业人士而言都明白易懂。

sentences.en: The Ukrainians speak a Slavonic language similar to Russian.
sentences.cn: 乌克兰人所说的那种斯拉夫语系的语言类似于俄语。

sentences.en: There'sno need for that kind of language in this magazine.
sentences.cn: 这份杂志没必要出现那种语言。

sentences.en: They were conversing in German, their only common language.
sentences.cn: 他们正用德语交谈，这是他们唯一的共同语言。

sentences.en: We were forbidden, under pain of imprisonment, to use our native language.
sentences.cn: 我们被禁止使用母语，违者将被关进监狱。

sentences.en: What I've tried very subtly to do is to reclaim language.
sentences.cn: 我费尽心机在做的就是改造、拯救语言。
